featured.text: The island continues to recover from its 1992 visit from Iniki, the most powerful hurricane to hit Hawaii this century.

definition.zh_def: 一種強烈的颶風，特別是指1992年襲擊夏威夷的颶風。
definition.en_def: A powerful hurricane, specifically referring to the hurricane that struck Hawaii in 1992.
definition.example: Hurricane Iniki caused significant damage to the island of Kauai.
